channel.title: Homes on Longqi Yang
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Longqi Yang

item.description: I design and build personalization and recommendation systems that balance commercial interests, individuals’ utility, and societal needs. I completed my Ph.D. in Computer Science from Cornell University, where I spent four years of my doctorial study at Cornell Tech. I was very fortunate to be advised by Prof. Deborah Estrin. My Ph.D. dissertation is available here: User-centric Recommendation System. Recent news: 1 paper accepted to Recsys 2019. 1 paper accepted to KDD 2019.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Teaching Assistant: CS5785 Applied Machine Learning CS5300 The Architecture of Large-scale Information System CS5434 Defending Computer Networks
